LCAnomalyCore.Defs.AbnormalityCodexEntry.label: Meat Lantern
LCAnomalyCore.Defs.AbnormalityCodexEntry.description: Meat Lantern (O-04-84) is a small, fluffy white mound with two round eyes at ground level of its containment room.\nIt has a glowing flower growing from its head and hanging in front of it like the lure of an anglerfish.\nThe rest of the Abnormality is buried underground.
